name: Grilled Swordfish and Pineapple Kebabs
author: MICHELLE0011
summary: Exotic and sweet grilled swordfish kebabs.
ingredients: 1 medium bell pepper, cored and seeded
2 tablespoons teriyaki sauce, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Place bamboo skewers in a shallow bowl, cover with water, and soak for 30 minutes
Place in a bowl, add 1/3 cup teriyaki sauce, and toss to coat
Place pineapple in another bowl, add chili-garlic sauce, and toss to coat
Marinate fish and pineapple at room temperature for 20 minutes
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate
Thread each skewer with fish, pineapple, and bell pepper pieces
Cook kebabs on the preheated grill until fish is just cooked through, 3 to 4 minutes per side
Serve with remaining teriyaki sauce for dipping
